{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20385v1", "title": "Weighted GKAT: Completeness and Complexity", "summary": "We propose Weighted Guarded Kleene Algebra with Tests (wGKAT), an
uninterpreted weighted programming language equipped with branching,
conditionals, and loops. We provide an operational semantics for wGKAT using a
variant of weighted automata and introduce a sound and complete axiomatization.
We also provide a polynomial time decision procedure for bisimulation
equivalence.", "main_category": "cs.LO", "categories": "cs.LO,cs.FL,cs.PL", "published": "2025-04-29T03:11:55Z"}
